title: MUSC 466
intro: An advanced mixed-voice chorus open to students, faculty, and members of the community. Performance of oratorios and other major choral works in cooperation with the University Symphony Orchestra, Wind Symphony, or other select ensemble. Open to all who have been accepted by audition, with assignments made according to proficiency. Completion of course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the ensemble.
